name: Atomic Riders
description:
Plot:

In 2145, The earth has been reduced to a barren Desert, after the death of most of the population of planet earth, a machine known only as "The Anti-Life Machine", threatens the last survivor of the Never-ending War, venturing outside of his compound, and following the coordinates given to him by a mysterious man on the radio, he tries to gather the lost parts to a shield which will protect him from the Neurotoxin which is about to be released onto the world...
